full_summary:
-----------------

### Tender Announcement: General Contractor Services

#### Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Title**: 
Supply Arrangement for General Contractor Services for Buildings 715 Peel (Montreal) and 1001 St-Laurent (Longueuil)

**Reference Number**: WS3863259817
**Amendment Number**: 1
**Solicitation Number**: WS3863259817
**Publication Date**: February 15, 2023
**Tender Closing Date and Time**: June 23, 2023, 14:00:00 (Eastern Time)
**Expected Contract Start Date**: None
**Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

#### Pre-Bidding Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest price
* **Procurement Category**: CNST
* **UNSPSC Codes**: 72121400 - Specialized public building construction services

#### Contact Information
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
Phone: [Not provided]
Email: [joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:joel.lussier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Web URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15431674?extsite=MTU0MzE2NzRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15431674?extsite=MTU0MzE2NzRfRq)

#### RFP Description
Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites you to submit a proposal for a general contractor to perform various building-related services for Buildings 715 Peel in Montreal and 1001 St-Laurent in Longueuil. For full details, please refer to the bid invitation.
**Note**: The original tender closing date and time have been modified. Bidders are expected to submit all required supporting documents and their bid before 14:00 HNE on March 28, 2023. **Late submissions will be declared non-conforming**.

### Exposure Unit Locations

* Montreal - Building 715 Peel
* Longueuil - Building 1001 St-Laurent

Please refer to the RFP documentation and the related URL for
